$:/plugins/can/rider/action-macros.title: $:/plugins/can/rider/action-macros
$:/plugins/can/rider/action-macros.text:
\define rider-toggle-edit() <$action-setfield $tiddler=<<editstatetid>> editstate="edit"/>
\define rider-toggle-view() <$action-setfield $tiddler=<<editstatetid>> editstate="view"/>

\define rider-startedit-actions() <<rider-toggle-edit>><$action-setfield $tiddler=<<editstatetid>> text={{!!text}}/>

\define rider-submitedit-actions() <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<<editstatetid>>/><$action-sendmessage $message='tm-auto-save-wiki'/>

\define rider-canceledit-actions() <$action-setfield text={{$(editstatetid)$}} $timestamp='no'/><<rider-toggle-view>>

$:/plugins/can/rider/macros.title: $:/plugins/can/rider/macros
$:/plugins/can/rider/macros.text:
\whitespace trim \define rider-editstatetid() <> \define rider(tiddler) <$list filter="[[$tiddler$]]"> <> \end \define rider-template() <$vars editstatetid=$(rider-editstatetid)$ >
<>
<> <>
\end \define rider-text() <$reveal type="nomatch" stateTitle=<> stateField=editstate text="edit" tag=div> <$transclude $tiddler="<>" mode="block"/> <$reveal type="match" stateTitle=<> stateField=editstate text="edit" tag=div class="rider-text"> <$keyboard tag="div" class="tc-can-keyboard" key="cmd-enter" actions="<>" > <$keyboard tag="div" class="tc-can-keyboard" key="((save-tiddler))" actions="<>" > <$keyboard tag="div" class="tc-can-keyboard" key="((cancel-edit-tiddler))" actions="<>"> <$transclude tiddler="$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/body/editor" mode="inline"/> \end \define rider-ctl()
<> <> <>
\end \define rider-cancel-button() <$button tag="div" class="rider-button tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Cancel text edit" aria-label="Cancel text edit"> <$reveal type="match" stateTitle=<> stateField=editstate text="edit"> <> {{$:/plugins/can/rider/escape.svg}} \end \define rider-edit-button() <$button tag="div" class="rider-button tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Click to toggle text edit" aria-label="Click to toggle text edit"> <$reveal type="nomatch" stateTitle=<> stateField=editstate text="edit"> <> {{$:/core/images/edit-button}} \end \define rider-submit-button() <$button tag="div" class="rider-submit rider-button tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="Submit changes" aria-label="Submit changes"> <$reveal type="match" stateTitle=<> stateField=editstate text="edit"> <> {{$:/plugins/can/rider/fastarrow.svg}} \end \define rider-link() <$draggable tiddler=<> > <$button class="rider-button tc-btn-invisible" to={{!!title}} tooltip="Open tiddler in story" aria-label="Open tiddler in story">{{$:/plugins/can/rider/fish-water.svg}} \end \define rider-title() <$draggable tiddler=<> class="rider-title"> <$button class="rider-button tc-btn-invisible" to={{!!title}} tooltip="Tiddler link" aria-label="Tiddler link"><$text text=<>/> \end

$:/plugins/can/rider/readme.title: $:/plugins/can/rider/readme
$:/plugins/can/rider/readme.caption: readme
$:/plugins/can/rider/readme.text:
''This plugin is not extensively tested. Back up any data you don't want to lose. That applies even if you aren't going to try this plugin.''

''Rider'' is a small ~TiddlyWiki plugin for transcluding tiddlers with some in-place editing capability. 

''Demo:'' https://clutterstack.github.io/can-tw/rider

''~TiddlyWiki:'' https://tiddlywiki.com

''~TiddlyWiki at ~GitHub:'' https://github.com/Jermolene/TiddlyWiki5

The ''Rider'' plugin exposes one macro: the ''rider'' macro, which transcludes a tiddler with a limited interface for editing in-place.

!! Parameter

;tiddler
: The title of the tiddler to transclude

$:/plugins/can/rider/stylesheet.title: $:/plugins/can/rider/stylesheet
$:/plugins/can/rider/stylesheet.creator: chris
